Title: Viceroy's House
Writer: Paul Mayeda Berges (screenplay by), Gurinder Chadha (screenplay by), Moira Buffini (screenplay by), Larry Collins (based on the book "Freedom at Midnight" by), Dominique Lapierre (based on the book "Freedom at Midnight" by), Narendra Singh Sarila (based on the book "The Shadow of the Great Game - The Untold Story of Partition" by)
Actors: Hugh Bonneville, Gillian Anderson, Manish Dayal, Huma Qureshi
Plot: The final Viceroy of India, Lord Mountbatten, is tasked with overseeing the transition of British India to independence, but meets with conflict as different sides clash in the face of monumental change.
